body_html:
Good catch. Could you submit a PR that replaces the check as

is_jpeg = math_ops.or(math_ops.equal(substr, b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe0', name='is_jfif'), math_ops.equal(substr, b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe1', name='is_exif'), name='is_jpeg')

(that's a little more conservative than your 3 byte check, but it is in the same spirit.) Thanks so much!
body_text:
Good catch. Could you submit a PR that replaces the check as
is_jpeg = math_ops.or(math_ops.equal(substr, b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe0', name='is_jfif'), math_ops.equal(substr, b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe1', name='is_exif'), name='is_jpeg')

(that's a little more conservative than your 3 byte check, but it is in the same spirit.) Thanks so much!
body:
Good catch. Could you submit a PR that replaces the check as
```
is_jpeg = math_ops.or(math_ops.equal(substr, b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe0', name='is_jfif'), math_ops.equal(substr, b'\xff\xd8\xff\xe1', name='is_exif'), name='is_jpeg')
```
(that's a little more conservative than your 3 byte check, but it is in the same spirit.) Thanks so much!
